subject: @RunWith, @SuiteClasses
msgSnippet: Hi guys, really need help with these ones. The annotations aren t mentioned either in FAQ, or Cookbook nor have I found a word on them in the official
messageBody:
Hi guys,


really need help with these ones. The annotations aren't mentioned
either in FAQ, or Cookbook nor have I found a word on them in the
"official" articles at JUnit.org.

The Javadoc doesn't say much on the syntax:

The SuiteClasses annotation specifies the classes to be run when a
class annotated with @RunWith(Suite.class) is run.

and a sample code from the post:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/16237

just won't compile because of the comma separating the two class names
(Syntax error on token ",", / expected).

What's the proper syntax, then?
